item.description:
Save the date! The Northeast Backcountry Coalition will be showing the Powderwhores telemark ski film "Flakes" http://www.facebook.c... and holding our third annual fundraiser on December 9th at 7:30 (doors open at 6:45) at the Regent Theatre http://www.facebook.c... in Arlington, MA. Tickets cost $10, and you get one raffle ticket with your purchase. Additional raffle tickets available for sale.

This year's beneficiaries are the Catamount Trail Association and the Maine Association for Search and Rescue.

Our grand prize is a season's pass to Jay Peak!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Santa hat

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Telemark Ski Film "Powderwhores" at the Regent Theater in Arlington, MA
